alert.note: Alert for Larimer (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 15 at 3:13PM MDT until further notice by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Cameron Peak burn scar, including Black Hollow and Crown Point Road. * WHEN...Until 615 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 311 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This may cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rustic. - This includes the following additional locations... Monument Gulch, Crown Point Road, Jacks Gulch, Black Hollow, Lower Pingree Park Road, Gulches along Highway 14 near and above Rustic, Pingree Hill.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
